name: Spirits' Interference
summary: You call forth protective spirits to ward off ranged attacks.
description:
You call forth protective spirits to ward off ranged attacks. Until your rage ends, anyone making a ranged attack against you must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or the attack misses with no effect.Traits

Divine: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.

Instinct: Instinct abilities require a specific instinct; you lose access if you perform acts anathema to your instinct.Necromancy: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the necromancy school of magic, typically involving forces of life and death.Rage: You must be raging to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
